summary: VEHICLE ACTUATOR BRAKE PUMP ASSEMBLY MAKING SQUEAKING BARKING NOISES WHEN THE BRAKE IS PRESSED DOWN AND HELD DOWN THE BRAKE PUMPS BACK AT ME. I TOOK TO TOYOTA THEY CHARGED ME FOR RUNNING CODES AND TWO BRAKE BLEEDS. AGKNOWLEDGED THAT IT'S THE BREAK ACTUATOR PUMP ASSEMBLY THAT IS A EXTENDED WARRENTY BUT WILL NOT FIX AND CHARGED ME BECAUSE THE WARNING LIGHT SYSTEM IS NOT COMING ON. THIS SHOULD BE A RECALL NOT AN EXTENDED WARRENTY. MY BRAKES BARK AND PUSH BACK EVERY TIME I BRAKE. THIS DOESN'T SEEM SAFE TO DRIVE ON THE FREEWAY AND NOT GOOD IF AN ACCIDENT INCURS BECAUSE I HAD TO WAIT UNTIL MY BRAKES DIDN'T WORK. PLEASE MAKE A RECALL AND NOT JUST AN EXTENDED WARRENTY.
